00025 #include "lpc17xx_timer.h"
00026 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_gpio.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"

00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00038 uint8_t menu1[] =
00039 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00040 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00041 "Timer Match interrupt demo \n\r"
00042 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00043 "\t - Core: ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r"
00044 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 -  115200 bps \n\r"
00045 " Use timer 0 toggle MAT0.0, pin P1.28 at frequency 1Hz\n\r"
00046 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00047 
00048 //timer init
00049 TIM_TIMERCFG_Type TIM_ConfigStruct;
00050 TIM_MATCHCFG_Type TIM_MatchConfigStruct ;
00051 uint8_t volatile timer0_flag = FALSE, timer1_flag = FALSE;
00052 FunctionalState LEDStatus = ENABLE;
00053 
00054 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTION *************************/
00055 /* Interrupt service routine */
00056 void TIMER0_IRQHandler(void);
00057 
00058 void print_menu(void);
00059 
00060 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00061 /*********************************************************************/
00066 void TIMER0_IRQHandler(void)
00067 {
00068         if (TIM_GetIntStatus(LPC_TIM0, TIM_MR0_INT)== SET)
00069         {
00070                 _DBG_("Match interrupt occur...");
00071         }
00072         TIM_ClearIntPending(LPC_TIM0, TIM_MR0_INT);
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00077 /*********************************************************************/
00082 void print_menu(void)
00083 {
00084         _DBG(menu1);
00085 }
00086 
00087 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00088 /*********************************************************************/
00093 int c_entry(void)
00094 {
00095         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00096 
00097         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00098          * – 115200bps
00099          * – 8 data bit
00100          * – No parity
00101          * – 1 stop bit
00102          * – No flow control
00103          */
00104         debug_frmwrk_init();
00105 
00106         // print welcome screen
00107         print_menu();
00108 
00109         // Conifg P1.28 as MAT0.0
00110         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00111         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00112         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00113         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00114         PinCfg.Pinnum = 28;
00115         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00116 
00117         // Initialize timer 0, prescale count time of 100uS
00118         TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_USVAL;
00119         TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleValue  = 100;
00120 
00121         // use channel 0, MR0
00122         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchChannel = 0;
00123         // Enable interrupt when MR0 matches the value in TC register
00124         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.IntOnMatch   = TRUE;
00125         //Enable reset on MR0: TIMER will reset if MR0 matches it
00126         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ResetOnMatch = TRUE;
00127         //Stop on MR0 if MR0 matches it
00128         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.StopOnMatch  = FALSE;
00129         //Toggle MR0.0 pin if MR0 matches it
00130         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ExtMatchOutputType =TIM_EXTMATCH_TOGGLE;
00131         // Set Match value, count value of 10000 (10000 * 100uS = 1000000us = 1s --> 1 Hz)
00132         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchValue   = 10000;
00133 
00134         // Set configuration for Tim_config and Tim_MatchConfig
00135         TIM_Init(LPC_TIM0, TIM_TIMER_MODE,&TIM_ConfigStruct);
00136         TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM0,&TIM_MatchConfigStruct);
00137 
00138         /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00139         NVIC_SetPriority(TIMER0_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00140         /* Enable interrupt for timer 0 */
00141         NVIC_EnableIRQ(TIMER0_IRQn);
00142         // To start timer 0
00143         TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0,ENABLE);
00144 
00145         while (1);
00146         return 1;
00147 
00148 }
00149 
00150 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00151 int main (void)
00152 {
00153         return c_entry();
00154 }
00155 #ifdef  DEBUG

00157 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00158 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00159 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00160 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00161 * @return               None
00162 *******************************************************************************/
00163 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00164 {
00165         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00166          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00167 
00168         /* Infinite loop */
00169         while(1);
00170 }
